claims.object: Site of synaptic transmission between motor neuron and muscle fiber

surface_layer.definition: A synapse between a motor neuron and a muscle fiber.

deep_layer.mechanism: Action potential in motor neuron triggers acetylcholine release, which binds to receptors on the muscle fiber, causing muscle contraction.

citations: The Neuromuscular Junction in Health and Disease: Molecular ... - Frontiers
Structure and Function of the Mammalian Neuromuscular Junction
